name: Wake On Lan for Harmattan
tagline: Wake On Lan tool to wake up LAN-Clients
body:
### Welcome
Wake On Lan is a tool wich allows you to wake up your LAN-Clients (PC, Server, Media Center, ...) in an easy way. It allows you to configure an unlimited number of LAN-Clients. Furthermore you can wake up your configured LAN-Clients directly from your Launcher-Screen or in your own Scripts using the "Copy wake-up-command".

Currently the following languages are supported: English and German.

This app is released under the terms of the GPL v3 and the sources can be found on the project-page on GitHub: https://github.com/ejjoman/wolEj

### Download
Wake On Lan is available in Nokia Store: [Normal version](http://store.ovi.com/content/315012), [Donate version](http://store.ovi.com/content/315196)

Please install the normal version first and if you like this app, buy the donate version :)

### Support
For questions and requests, please use [wolEj's support thread at talk.maemo.org](http://talk.maemo.org/showthread.php?t=86842).

### Help the Project
If you like this App, please buy the donate version from Ovi Store. If you want to donate an custom amount to this project, feel free to donate via PayPal by clicking on this button:

[![Donate](https://www.paypalobjects.com/en_US/i/btn/btn_donateCC_LG.gif)](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=KKQX7F8QMANK8)

Or if you don't like to donate via PayPal - Just contact me :-)
